sources.title: The Red Tent, Part Two
sources.description:
Torn by personal guilt, Italian General Umberto Nobile reminisces about his 1928 failed Arctic expedition aboard the airship Italia. 

Part One: https://youtu.be/NovoRWvzDCg

Year of production: 1969

Directed by: Mikhail Kalatozov
Writed by: Ennio De Concini
Music: Alexander Zatsepin, Ennio Morricone
Operator: Leonid Kalashnikov
Production Designers: David Vinitsky, Mikhail Fishgoit, Giancarlo Salimbeni

Starring: Peter Finch, Sean Connery, Claudia Cardinale, Nikita Mikhalkov, Luigi Vanukki, Mario Adorf, Donatas Banionis, Massimo Girotti

#The_red_tent #Sean_connery #History #FullMoviesWithEngSubs

metadata.Plot: The commander of a failed 1928 Arctic airship expedition is remembering the events of the "Italia" airship flight, crash, and subsequent rescue efforts. The "ghosts" of people involved in the events appear in his memories to assist him in determining his guilt in the affair. The reminiscences are mixed with the real action: the flight of the "Italia", the air rescue operation from Kings Bay airfield, the expedition of the "Krassin" ice-breaker. A sort of human touch is added by the ever beautiful C.C. playing Malmgren's girlfriend.
metadata.Writer: Ennio De Concini, Richard DeLong Adams, Robert Bolt
metadata.Actors: Sean Connery, Peter Finch, Claudia Cardinale
